history.proof: intros l. induction l. - unfold isort. apply permutation_refl. - simpl. sauto lq: on depth: 3use: insert_ordered, isort_ordered, ordered_nil, ordered_cons.

original: intros l. induction l. - unfold isort. simpl. apply permutation_refl. - simpl. apply permutation_insert. + apply IHl. + apply isort_ordered. + apply insert_ordered. * apply isort_ordered. * apply ordered_cons. ++ apply order_fun_true. reflexivity. ++ apply ordered_nil.
